message: I'll give you a generous offer, but it's a one-time deal. Accept it and we can call it a day.
Take it or leave it, Alice!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting any younger either, Alice!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't expect a better offer!
I'm not panicking yet, but you should be!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my best and final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're not done yet, Alice. I'm not giving up!
You're getting desperate, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or walk away!
I'm not desperate yet, Alice. I'll keep pushing for a better deal!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or we'll both walk away with nothing. You're running out of time!
It's now or never, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
